Arch

This is a page I keep for our incredible friend, Arch. He passed away in 2018 summer. I had the pleasure of living with him for 10 years before I moved to US in 2015. He has and always will have such a special place in our hearts.

A very silent, calm, quite and humane dog. That's why I used to love to annoy him :) Here's a couple photos where I'm messing with him. If you want to see photos in which I really make him annoyed, I can send them to you. It takes a real effort to get him angry :)

Here's "Afghan Arch":

and here's "Arch Kenobi":

Here's Arch having a relaxing bath:

Arch on the treadmill, working out:

There are (literally) hundreds of photos of Arch, I'll post them here occasionally.
